amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to divest, retire, transfer, or place in storage, or prepare to divest, retire, transfer, or place in storage, any A-10 aircraft, or to disestablish any units of the active or reserve component associated with such aircraft.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (MI) amendment (A037) Agreed to by recorded vote: 300 - 114 (Roll no. 322).
